name: Bread delivery
description:
Controls:

Throw Bread at people: Left Click

Restart game after being fired (breaks a lot): R

Movement: WASD

Look around: Move mouse

You are a bread delivery guy and you need to deliver bread to your neighbor hood. Don't slack out on the job because you need to keep your yolp rating above 1.5 stars or you'll be fired! Each level is increasingly more stressful and longer than the last.

Bread 3d model by: https://sketchfab.com/3d-models/bread-92195b85d96342a394bf352ed0568838
